      74             :   static bool IsInServoTraversal()
      75             :   {
      76             :     // The callers of this function are generally main-thread-only _except_
      77             :     // for potentially running during the Servo traversal, in which case they may
      78             :     // take special paths that avoid writing to caches and the like. In order
      79             :     // to allow those callers to branch efficiently without checking TLS, we
      80             :     // maintain this static boolean. However, the danger is that those callers
      81             :     // are generally unprepared to deal with non-Servo-but-also-non-main-thread
      82             :     // callers, and are likely to take the main-thread codepath if this function
      83             :     // returns false. So we assert against other non-main-thread callers here.
      84             :     MOZ_ASSERT(sInServoTraversal || NS_IsMainThread());
      85           0 :     return sInServoTraversal;
      86             :   }
